org.springframework.data.redis.connection

接口 ReactiveNumberCommands

  • 所有已知子接口:
    ReactiveClusterNumberCommands

    public interface ReactiveNumberCommands
    Redis numeric commands executed using reactive infrastructure.
    从以下版本开始:
    2.0

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明

      DECRBY command parameters.
      static class  ReactiveNumberCommands.HIncrByCommand<T extends Number>
      HINCRBY command parameters.
      static class  ReactiveNumberCommands.IncrByCommand<T extends Number>
      INCRBY command parameters.
